name: Quick Onion Sauce
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onions, peeled, quartered and very thinly sliced
8 green or red bird chilies, seeded and minced
8 lime leaves, thinly sliced, or an additional stalk lemongrass
1 shallot, peeled and very finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl and stir with a wooden spoon for 3 to 4 minutes. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for several hours to allow the flavors to develop. Serve as a sauce over fish or chicken, with rice on the side.
